quote: Givers get. When I pivot to helping others, opportunities seem to come my way.
why_clipworthy: This highlights the power of giving back and how it can lead to unexpected opportunities.
suggested_hook: Want more opportunities in real estate? Try giving back!

quote: Sometimes in a hot market, I'll put in an offer and say, '24 hours, take it or leave it.'
why_clipworthy: This tactic creates urgency and shows confidence in negotiations.
suggested_hook: Need a bold strategy to win in a competitive market?
